Happy Holidays!

OK, so this isn't much of a NEWS update, but I did want to stop by here and wish everyone a happy holiday season and a prosperous New Year. I also want to say thank you to everyone that has worked so hard to make this Fellowship what it is today. It's because of the quality of each and every one of our members that makes this guild so special. Keep up the good work and see you in Norrath!
~ Sage Kamdar Entilzha
There is a guild meeting coming up! Announcements will be made and awards will be handed out to all that were nominated. More info is coming so keep a close eye on the forum! Also Skynight is leading the guild on its first Sebillis raid on the 4th of January. Find out more about this on our events forum.
12/28/02
GUILD MEETING: TBA!
By Cobo
